@bronsongotn
If it's below Dvd quality then why not get the dvd rip at half the size? You will get about the same quality if not better since it's image is 10x smaller while the bitrate is only cut in half. That means more data is used to represent each image per second. The image size has nothing to do with quality. It's really about pixel density.
